Package com.seinksansdoozebank.fr.statistics

Class GameStatisticsAnalyzer

java.lang.Object
com.seinksansdoozebank.fr.statistics.GameStatisticsAnalyzer
public class GameStatisticsAnalyzer extends Object
The GameStatisticsAnalyzer class is responsible for analyzing game statistics and logging aggregated statistics.

  • Method Details

    • runDemo

      public void runDemo()
      Runs a demo game session with all types of bots and analyzes the results.

    • runAndAnalyze

      public void runAndAnalyze (int numRandomBots, int numSmartBots, int numCustomBots, int numRichardBots, int numBuilderBots, int numOpportunistBots)
      Runs and analyzes multiple game sessions with the specified number of random bots, smart bots, and custom bots. This method runs multiple game sessions, resets player IDs and the bank for each session, creates a new game instance, runs the game, logs the completion of each game session, analyzes the results of each game, logs aggregated statistics, and optionally saves statistics to a CSV file.
      Parameters:
      numRandomBots - The number of random bots to be included in each game session.
      numSmartBots - The number of smart bots to be included in each game session.
      numCustomBots - The number of custom bots to be included in each game session.
      numRichardBots - The number of richard bots to be included in each game session.
      numBuilderBots - The number of builder bots to be included in each game session.
      numOpportunistBots - The number of opportunist bots to be included in each game session.

    • analyzeGameResults

      public void analyzeGameResults (Game game)
      Analyzes the results of a game and updates player statistics accordingly. This method analyzes the results of the provided game, including player scores and placements. It updates the player statistics map based on the game results, including the total number of games played, games won, games lost, games played in the last position, and the scores obtained by each player. Additionally, it records the placement of each player in the game.
      Parameters:
      game - The game instance to analyze the results of.
